altText: Aromatic Mutton Dum Biryani with tender meat and a boiled egg
name: Classic Mutton Biryani
description: A timeless classic. Succulent mutton pieces slow-cooked with fragrant basmati rice in a sealed pot.

altText: Grand Mutton Raan Biryani, a feast for royalty
name: Shaahi Mutton Raan Biryani
description: A royal centerpiece. Tender, whole-roasted mutton leg marinated in spices, layered with saffron-infused rice.

altText: Flavorful Chicken Dum Biryani with a potato
name: Classic Chicken Dum Biryani
description: Juicy chicken and a signature soft potato, slow-cooked (dum-pukht) with aromatic rice. An all-time favorite.

altText: Delicate Fish Biryani with boneless fillets and spices
name: Spiced Fish Biryani
description: Tender, boneless fish fillets marinated in spices, layered with fragrant, long-grain rice.

name: Smoky Prawns Biryani
description: Plump, smoky prawns tikka tossed with fragrant basmati rice and a blend of coastal spices.

altText: A hearty plate of Vegetable Dum Biryani
name: Vegetable Dum Biryani
description: A delightful medley of seasonal vegetables and soft potatoes, slow-cooked with aromatic spices and basmati rice.

altText: Rich and savory Special Chicken Chaap
name: Special Chicken Chaap
description: A slow-cooked delicacy. A tender chicken leg on the bone, marinated and simmered in a rich, aromatic gravy.
